mapper.select: SELECT id, auth_id AS authId, plan_id AS planId, username, password, name, phone_num AS phoneNum, email, address, point, provider, provider_id AS providerId, signed_at AS signedAt, paid_at AS paidAt, status_plan AS statusPlan, status_account AS statusAccount, rental_cnt AS rentalCnt FROM user WHERE username=#{username}

SELECT id, auth_id AS authId, plan_id AS planId, username, password, name, phone_num AS phoneNum, email, address, point, provider, provider_id AS providerId, signed_at AS signedAt, paid_at AS paidAt, status_plan AS statusPlan, status_account AS statusAccount, rental_cnt AS rentalCnt FROM user WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user( auth_id,plan_id,username,password,name,phone_num,email,address, point,provider,provider_id,signed_at,paid_at,status_plan,status_account,rental_cnt ) VALUES ( #{authId}, #{planId}, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNum}, #{email}, #{address}, #{point}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, NOW(), NOW(), #{statusPlan}, #{statusAccount}, #{rentalCnt} )
